attributes.action: GOVERNMENT SELECTED BY LEGAL ELECTION OF THE UK PEOPLE AND NOT BY STEALTH
attributes.additional_details: NEWS McDonnell states the Queen as no choice but to make Corbyn PM, this is a man who wishes to destroy the Royal Family, hypocrisy reigns
attributes.background: Labour and others are trying to use Brexit to gain control of the UK, this is not democracy and would lead to the same values for example as VENEZUELA.
